seo.title: Android Update: Select Your Perfect Meeting Format | Minutes.AI
seo.description: Huge update for Android! Join 30,000 users in 150 countries. You can now select specific AI formats (Medical, Sales, General) directly on your Android device.
seo.ogTitle: Android Users: The 'Format Selection' Update is Here
seo.ogDescription: Stop settling for generic summaries. Minutes.AI for Android now lets you switch between Negotiation, Brainstorming, and Medical formats instantly.

ld.headline: Minutes.AI Android Update: Format Selection Now Live
ld.description: The feature iOS users love is now on Android. Select from multiple AI structures to fit your meeting context perfectly.

hero.h1: Android Users: Unlock the Power of Context
hero.tagline: The wait is over. The feature loved by our iOS community is now live on Android. Choose the perfect structure for your conversation—instantly.

stats.label: Trust Minutes.AI
stats.desc: Join the global community transforming how the world records meetings.

intro.p1: Until today, our Android version offered a powerful—but singular—summary style. But as we discussed in our previous notes on 'Meaningful Minutes,' a doctor's appointment needs a different structure than a sales pitch.
intro.p2: We believe AI should adapt to *you*, not the other way around. That is why we are bringing Format Selection to the Google Play Store.

formats.p1: With this update, you can tap a button to tell the AI exactly what kind of conversation you are recording. Here is what you get:

list.title: Standard General
list.desc: The classic. Perfect for internal syncs. Focuses on Decisions, To-Dos, and Risks.

list.title: Sales & Negotiation
list.desc: Tracks monetary figures, objections, client concerns, and closing commitments.

list.title: Medical (SOAP)
list.desc: Structured for healthcare professionals. Subjective, Objective, Assessment, and Plan.

list.title: Brainstorming
list.desc: Captures raw ideas, themes, and 'what if' scenarios without filtering creativity.

demo.context: Context: A client discusses a budget concern.

old.label: Generic Mode
old.text: User discussed price. User A said it is too high. User B offered a discount.

new.label: New Sales Format
new.text:
**Objection:** Client flagged 15% budget variance.
**Counter:** Proposed payment terms extension (Net 60).
**Outcome:** Client agreed to review updated proposal by Friday.

wrap.p: Don't let your meetings get lost in translation. Join the 30,000 professionals across 150 countries who have already upgraded their workflow.
